links.title: UPDATE: If Apple makes big news at its developers conference next week, it would be big news
links.description: By Emily Bary Apple analysts generally expect incrementalism on the hardware and software fronts Heading into Apple Inc.'s annual Worldwide Developers Conference on Monday, expectations aren't particularly high. Last year, Apple(AAPL)fans pretty much knew ahead of WWDC that the company was going to announce a voice-controlled speaker (http://www.marketwatch.com/story/apple-unveils-smart-speaker-with-focus-on-music-as-it-battles-google-amazon-2017-06-05) and upgrade some of its computers, in addition to making the usual sorts of software improvements.

links.title: Streaming Sticker Shock
links.description: The idea of Ã  la carte entertainment resonates with consumers. No one wants to pay for content they don't consume. That said, the race to adapt audio and video distribution models to trending consumer behavior is turning into a hot mess.
